title: 【文宣注意】 警方5點預言玩立會空城計 英文全文

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/HongKongPoliceForce/videos/679387209167765/


HK Police Uses Pre-recorded Video to Stage "Occupy Legco" Farce

Hong Kong Police Force released a video clip on Facebook at 10:21 today (July 1st), condemning protesters for breaking and entering Legco, and destroying properties inside around 9 pm.

Netizens discovered the watch worn by the police spokesman was actually showing ~5 pm, well before the protesters breached the police cordon line inside Legco; meaning the fortune-telling video had to have been recorded in advance.

At around 9 pm, the commander deliberately ordered the police on duty to retreat, giving up the stronghold for no good reason; the protesters then entered Legco through the broken roll-up gate and occupied Legco for about 3 hours til 12 pm before they left.


The author of this article hereby waives all claim of copyright; it may be used in any manner without further attribution or notice to the creator.

HK Police Uses Pre-recorded Video to Stage "Occupy Legco" Farce

Hong Kong Police Force released a video clip on Facebook at 10:21 pm today (July 1st), condemning protesters for breaking and entering Legco, and destroying properties inside around 9 pm.

Netizens discovered the watch worn by the police spokesman was actually showing ~5 pm, well before the protesters breached the police cordon line inside Legco; meaning the fortune-telling video had to have been recorded in advance.

At around 9 pm, the commander deliberately ordered the police on duty to retreat, giving up the stronghold for no good reason; the protesters then entered Legco through the broken roll-up gate and occupied Legco for about 3 hours til 12 am before they left.

agent provocateurs

replies.msg: An agent provocateur (French for "inciting agent") is a person who commits or who acts to entice another person to commit an illegal or rash act or falsely implicate them in partaking in an illegal act, so as to ruin the reputation or entice legal action against the target or a group they belong to. An agent provocateur may be a member of a law enforcement agency acting out of their own sense of duty or under orders, or other entity. They may target any group, such as a peaceful protest or demonstration, a union, a political party or a company.
